name: ralph-local
description: Complete local task workflow automation: planning with user stories, interactive/headless collaboration, and autonomous implementation via the Ralph Wiggum loop. All tasks stored in local JSON files.
author: steve

skills.name: ralph
skills.description: Execute one Ralph Wiggum loop iteration. Reads local JSON tasks, implements next incomplete story, runs quality checks, marks complete.

skills.name: interactive-planning
skills.description: Create detailed local task files with user stories and acceptance criteria through interactive Q&A.

skills.name: headless-planning
skills.description: Async iterative planning via markdown files. Questions and answers happen in a planning document.

commands.name: import-tasks
commands.description: Import tasks from a markdown file into local JSON task format.
